न्यूज ट्री HomeActivity Android Studio Settings Home Opps! OK Settings Enable Biometric Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Share App Change App Font Select Font Change Font Select Theme Color There is no internet connection,Please check your internet connection. www Enter your website url here Enter valid url You can organize just about anything by using WebviewX Are you sure do you want to exit from app? Yes No Exit App invite link Invalid Share url Enter App Id A Dynamic App Id is showing on url "http://webviewxapi/appsettingsinput.html",just add your AppId in box and Change the properties, all changes you can see here after submit
Sdk version not supported Device does not support biometric authentication Fingerprint is not registered in device Permission is not granted by user Login not successful! Authentication cancelled by user Authentication Done Authentication Authenticate to your WebviewX India account Place your finger on the device home button to verify your identity CANCEL You need to start app again to see font family changes. To read all Hindi Newspaper,I recommend you to download "NewsTree Hindi" app. To View the changes you need to restart app.
